snippet: In the town of Xiangtan in Hunan Province, a group of cabdrivers recorded a protest song after the government sought to reorganize the local taxi licensing system.
abstract: In the town of Xiangtan in Hunan Province, a group of cabdrivers recorded a protest song after the government sought to reorganize the local taxi licensing system.

headline.main: Chinese Cab Drivers Take to Song to Call for Their Own Company
